fields.name: NOTICE_DATE
fields.doc: date and time of notice creation

fields.name: TRIGGER_NUM
fields.doc: integer or string of digits uniquely identifying event

fields.name: SEG_NUM
fields.doc: Swift serial number (for Swift notice types only)

fields.name: GRB_RA_J2000
fields.doc: ra of GRB/Transient in J2000 epoch [deg]

fields.name: GRB_DEC_J2000
fields.doc: dec of GRB/Transient in J2000 epoch [deg]

fields.name: TRIGGER_INDEX
fields.doc: id number of successful trigger criteria

fields.name: RATE_SIGNIF
fields.doc: strength of rate domain at time of trigger [sigma]

fields.name: IMAGE_SIGNIF
fields.doc: strength of image domain at time of trigger [sigma]

fields.name: WAIT_TIME
fields.doc: number of seconds until the target becomes viewable [sec]

fields.name: OBS_TIME
fields.doc: number of seconds the target is observable [sec]

fields.name: MERIT
fields.doc: total calculated value for the given burst
